DOC.brief_title: Phase IIa Venous Thromboembolism ( VTE ) Prevention Study In Total Knee Replacement ( TKR )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients schedule primary elective unilateral total knee arthroplasty . Exclusion criterion : Women surgically sterile postmenopausal Have contraindication contract venography Have know disorder associate increase risk bleed immobile 12 week surgery .
